DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the study is to assess that it will be possible to control with a single cycle of rituximab patient with bullous pemphigoid.
DOC.brief_title: Efficiency and Tolerance of Rituximab (mabth√©ra) in Bullous Pemphigoid
DOC.detailed_description: The objective of this study is to assess the efficacy and tolerance of a single cycle of rituximab in control of bullous pemphigoid. the main objects are : 1. to assess that a single cycle of rituximab is able to control patient with corticosteroid-dependent bullous pemphigoid, 2. to avoid the use of corticosteroid in long time, 3. to evaluate duration of control disease and side effect with a single cycle of rituximab.
